About Me

Hi, my name is William and I am currently studying the BSc. Artificial Intelligence and Data at the Technical University of Denmark on my 6th semester. I am very passionate about machine learning. Furthermore, I am very engaged in the student life at DTU, where I am a part of the student council and was a tutor (vector) for the new students starting on the BSc. Artificial Intelligence and Data. I was elected as one of the 29 Coordinator of the Studystart shortened as (KABS) at DTU for new year of 2024. Here, I had the responsibility for hiring new tutors, planning the intro week and much more. This has developed my communication and leadership skills.
